effect: A Condition caused when a creature's heart is full of bravery. A creature gains Momentum equal to their topmost Courage Token if they end their turn adjacent to a hostile creature. If they do, they clear their topmost Courage Token. A creature may spend Focus at the end of a turn to remove a total value of Courage (not Tokens) equal to one less than the Focus spent. If a creature has any Fear Tokens and would gain a Courage Token, they instead remove their topmost Fear Token.

A Condition caused when a creature's spirit is rattled. A creature with Fear must end their Turn a number of spaces away from all foes equal to twice their topmost Fear Token Value. If they do, they clear their topmost Fear Token. If they do not, do not clear the Fear Token and instead lose 1 Momentum and gain an Impair Token of a value equal to the Fear Token. If the creature has no Momentum, they additionally gain a Hobbled Token of a value equal to the Fear Token. A creature may spend Focus at the end of a turn to remove a total value of Fear (not Tokens) equal to one less than the Focus spent. If a creature has any Courage Tokens and would gain a Fear Token, they instead remove their topmost Courage Token.
